00030 #ifndef __GLESHardwareVertexBuffer_H__
00031 #define __GLESHardwareVertexBuffer_H__
00032 
00033 #include "OgreGLESPrerequisites.h"
00034 #include "OgreHardwareVertexBuffer.h"
00035 
00036 namespace Ogre {
00038     class _OgreGLESExport GLESHardwareVertexBuffer : public HardwareVertexBuffer
00039     {
00040         private:
00041             GLuint mBufferId;
00042             // Scratch buffer handling
00043             bool mLockedToScratch;
00044             size_t mScratchOffset;
00045             size_t mScratchSize;
00046             void* mScratchPtr;
00047             bool mScratchUploadOnUnlock;
00048 
00049         protected:
00051             void* lockImpl(size_t offset, size_t length, LockOptions options);
00053             void unlockImpl(void);
00054 
00055         public:
00056             GLESHardwareVertexBuffer(HardwareBufferManagerBase* mgr, size_t vertexSize, size_t numVertices,
00057                                    HardwareBuffer::Usage usage, bool useShadowBuffer);
00058             virtual ~GLESHardwareVertexBuffer();
00059 
00061             void readData(size_t offset, size_t length, void* pDest);
00062 
00064             void writeData(size_t offset, size_t length, 
00065                            const void* pSource, bool discardWholeBuffer = false);
00066 
00068             void _updateFromShadow(void);
00069 
00070             GLuint getGLBufferId(void) const { return mBufferId; }
00071     };
00072 }
